item.title: Getting Started With InnerSource
item.description: InnerSource, le puissant mouvement de développement de logiciels libres dans les murs d’une organisation, où l'“ouverture” d’un projet s’étend à toutes les équipes de l’entreprise. L’auteur Andy Oram vous emmène à l’intérieur de l’InnerSource, d’abord en passant en revue les principes qui font le succès du développement de logiciels libres, puis en décrivant comment l’InnerSource a fonctionné chez PayPal.

item.title: InnerSource for Project Leaders
item.description: After completing this segment, you will have a better understanding of how InnerSource speeds up product development.

item.title: InnerSource Patterns
item.description: L'InnerSource Commons offre un forum à la communauté pour qu'elle partage son expérience et apprenne les uns des autres sous la forme de patterns InnerSource.

item.title: Introduction
item.description: The Contributor in InnerSource Have you ever been blocked in your next coding task because another team didn’t have time to add a feature in their system that you depend on?

item.title: Introduction
item.description: Ce parcours d’apprentissage est une introduction à l’InnerSource. L’InnerSource est la mise en oeuvre des pratiques et des principes du développement logiciel de l’Open Source au sein de l’entreprise.

item.title: Présentation du rôle de Trusted Committer (TC)
item.description: Le rôle de Trusted Committer (TC) est un des rôles clés dans la communauté InnerSource. Pensez aux Trusted Committers comme les personnes dans une communauté à qui en qui vous avez confiance pour prendre des décisions techniques importantes et pour guider les contributeurs pour que les contributions franchissent la ligne d’arrivée.

item.title: Becoming an InnerSource Contributor
item.description: InnerSource contributors operate outside of regular team boundaries, they are the links crossing organizational silos. As such, they need to be aware of a few common practices that make this work more effective.

item.title: Garantir la Qualité du Produit
item.description: Commençons par la responsabilité la plus souvent associée au rôle de Trusted Committer: garantir la qualité des produits.

item.title: How Difficult it is to be Middle Management
InnerSource and Agile
item.description: You want to improve your product and deliver faster to customers. You want to make stakeholders happy.

item.title: Quels problèmes l'InnerSource peut-il résoudre ?
item.description: L’InnerSource encourage et récompense la collaboration et la réutilisation du code avec quiconque, quelle que soit sa position dans la structure organisationnelle de l’entreprise.

item.title: Understanding the InnerSource Checklist
item.description: L’auteur Silona Bonewald explique comment l’initiative InnerSource peut aider votre entreprise à développer des logiciels en interne en appliquant les leçons du mouvement Open Source. Une checklist vous guide à travers les différentes étapes nécessaires pour produire des logiciels en utilisant l’approche InnerSource, que ce soit à l’échelle de l’entreprise ou pour une seule équipe.

item.title: Comment fonctionne l'InnerSource ?
item.description: Disons que l’équipe A utilise un logiciel produit par l’équipe B. L’équipe A soumet une demande de fonctionnalité à l’équipe B, mais l’équipe B n’est pas en mesure d’implémenter cette fonctionnalité à temps pour l’équipe A.

item.title: Contributor Ethos
item.description: In the last segment we have outlined why you would want to reuse components and become active as a Contributor.

item.title: Garder la communauté en bonne santé
item.description: L’introduction a souligné que les Trusted Committers ont des responsabilités à la fois axées sur la technologie et sur la collectivité.

item.title: InnerSource and Planning
item.description: Planning plays a role in InnerSource in two important situations: Contributing teams need to understand that working on upstream code typically does need more time than making comparable changes to their own codebase that they are well familiar with.

item.title: Major Benefits are Built into the InnerSource Process
Managing InnerSource Projects
item.description: Comment gérer les projets InnerSource ? Dans ce livre, Daniel Izquierdo et José Manrique López expliquent l’infrastructure de base ainsi que les métriques qui sont utiles lors de l’introduction des méthodologies InnerSource dans une entreprise.

item.title: Adopting InnerSource
item.description: Danese Cooper and Klaas-Jan Stol présentent une série d’études de cas dans diverses entreprises afin de montrer quand et pourquoi l’InnerSource peut être utile à votre organisation. Les études de cas discutent des difficultés à lancer des projets InnerSource, ainsi que des progrès réalisés jusqu’à ce jour et de leurs retombées positives ou négatives.

item.title: InnerSource and Negotiation Skills
item.description: Coding and negotiation? You may ask yourself how these two go together. In particular for InnerSource host teams it helps to have a few stumbling blocks in mind when it comes to change negotiation.

item.title: Mechanics of contributing
item.description: Are you ready to start contributing to other teams projects/repos? Do you look forward to reducing your blockers not by management escalation but by collaboration?

item.title: Membres de la communauté Upleveling
item.description: Il existe un continuum de participation dans une communauté InnerSource. Il y a des gens qui ne sont pas au courant de la communauté.

item.title: Quels sont les avantages de l'InnerSource ?
item.description: Il existe de nombreux avantages à collaborer via l’InnerSource. L’InnerSource offre à une entreprise une stratégie évolutive permettant aux équipes invitées d’obtenir des demandes de fonctionnalités lorsqu’elles en ont besoin, sans le fardeau à long terme de la maintenance.

item.title: State of InnerSource Survey 2016
item.description: Rapport du State of InnerSource Survey de 2016

item.title: State of InnerSource Survey 2020
item.description: Rapport du State of InnerSource Survey de 2020

item.title: State of InnerSource Survey 2021
item.description: Rapport du State of InnerSource Survey de 2021

item.title: State of InnerSource Survey 2023
item.description: Report of the 2022-2023 State of InnerSource Survey

item.title: State of InnerSource Survey 2024
item.description: Report of the 2024 State of InnerSource Survey

item.title: Abaissement des barrières à l'entrée
item.description: La sollicitation de contributions dans une communauté InnerSource est plus difficile que dans une communauté Open Source pour un certain nombre de raisons:

item.title: Benefits of becoming an InnerSource Contributor
item.description: Contributors are the life blood of InnerSource projects. Every project that is run as an InnerSource project comes both with the promise and with the ultimate goal of expanding their development team beyond the original founders, tapping into the potential of further collaborators amongst users (also sometimes referred to as customers in corporations) of that project.

item.title: InnerSource Patterns
item.description: Un Pattern - C’est le nom donné aux meilleures pratiques de l’InnerSource codifiées dans un format spécifique pour faciliter leur compréhension, leur évaluation et leur application dans votre contexte. Ce livre contient les patterns les plus matures, collectés par la Communauté InnerSource Commons.

item.title: Les principes de l'InnerSource
item.description: Chaque entreprise, équipe, projet et individu est différent. C’est pourquoi la façon exacte dont le concept d’InnerSource fonctionne varie d’une situation à l’autre.

item.title: Options for Shared Ownership
item.description: "If everyone owns it, nobody is accountable." Traditional organizations prefer to have a single point of contact in case of issues.

item.title: Conclusion
item.description: Thanks for reviewing the Contributor segment of the InnerSource Commons Learning Path. With this section you’ve learned about the Contributor role - the life blood of InnerSource projects.

item.title: Conclusion
item.description: Dans ce parcours d’apprentissage, nous avons proposé une introduction à l’InnerSource. L’InnerSource applique les meilleures pratiques et les principes de l’open source au développement de logiciels internes.

item.title: Défendre les besoins de la communauté
item.description: Les communautés InnerSource existent dans un contexte d’entreprise et sont donc plus contraintes que les communautés Open Source.

item.title: Relation to Open Source
item.description: InnerSource is the application of Open Source collaboration best practices inside of the confines of corporations.

item.title: Devenir un Trusted Committer
item.description: Le rôle de Trusted Committer est un rôle exigeant mais satisfaisant. Si ce parcours d’apprentissage vous intéresse, vous pourriez vous demander comment devenir un Trusted Committer et si vous êtes la bonne personne pour le travail.

item.title: FAQ
item.description: To conclude the Introduction segment of the Learning Path, here are some Frequently Asked Questions people have when embarking on their InnerSource journey.

item.title: Workbook
item.description: Video: InnerSource Contributor SEGMENT: Becoming an InnerSource Contributor TIP: More than one answer may be correct in some questions.

item.title: Workbook
item.description: Video: InnerSource Product Owners SEGMENT: How Difficult It Is to Be Middle Management TIP: More than one answer may be correct in some questions.

item.title: Conclusion
item.description: Dans les chapitres précédents, nous avons appris les responsabilités des Trusted Committers. Certaines de ces responsabilités comprennent l’assurance de la qualité des produits, le maintien de la santé de la communauté, la réduction des obstacles à la contribution, l’amélioration de la communauté et la défense de ses besoins au sein de l’organisation.

item.title: Is InnerSource Right for My Project?
item.description: InnerSource is the application of open source principles to company-internal software development. Done right, it unblocks progress and eases adoption of shared services and modules.

item.title: The InnerSource Mentality
item.description: InnerSource helps when there are multiple teams at our company that have a shared need - business or technical.

item.title: Workbook
item.description: Video: The Trusted Committer Role in InnerSource SEGMENT: Introduction Question 1. What sentence best describes the motivation for the name “Trusted Committer”?

item.title: Workbook
item.description: Video: Introduction to InnerSource SEGMENT: What Problems Does InnerSource Solve? TIP: More than one answer may be correct in some questions.

item.title: InnerSource Summit 2024
item.description: Register Speakers Sponsor Contact Us Registrations are Now Open 20th & 21st November 2024 - online Join us at the world’s leading gathering of InnerSource practitioners.

item.title: Building Sustainable Internal Developer Platforms with InnerSource
item.description: In this community call we will hear David Grizzanti, from The New York Times, discuss Building Sustainable Internal Developer Platforms with InnerSource.

item.title: Promoting InnerSource Practices with an Internal Developer Platform
item.description: In this community call we will hear from Vincent Caldeira (Red Hat), Clemens Jütte (Humanitec), Luiz Fernando Almeida de Oliveira (Red Hat), as they discuss Promoting InnerSource Practices with an Internal Developer Platform.

item.title: Getting Started with InnerSource Consultations
item.description: In this community call we will hear from Gale McCommons & Anusha Pavuluri, from Comcast, as they discuss Getting Started with InnerSource Consultations.

item.title: InnerSource as one step towards Open Source
item.description: In this community call we will hear from Isabel Drost-Fromm, from Europace AG/ InnerSource Commons Foundation, on how to utilize InnerSource as one step towards Open Source.

item.title: The A,B,Cs of InnerSource
item.description: In this community call we will hear from three senior Members of the InnerSource Commons Foundation.

item.title: InnerSource Commons AMA (Ask Me Anything)
item.description: Join us for an Ask Me Anything session with Georg Grütter and Dr. Wolfgang Gehring. Bring all your questions!

item.title: InnerSource Commons AMA (Ask Me Anything)
item.description: Join us for an Ask Me Anything session with Matt Cobby and Guilherme Dellagustin. Bring all your questions!

item.title: State of InnerSource 2024
item.description: Join us for our State of InnerSource 2024 Call, where Clare Dillon, from University of Galway, Ireland, will take us on a deep dive of this year’s results.

item.title: Insightful Learning - InnerSource Dojo Way
item.description: Unpack the InnerSource Dojo model which led to generating over $4M annually in fresh revenue streams through a strategic Kubernetes initiative.

item.title: InnerSource Commons welcomes our new Board and Officers
item.description: May 15, 2024 The InnerSource Commons Foundation is delighted to announce the election of the Board for the coming year.

item.title: Mastering Open Source - Balancing the Code Supply Chain, IP, and Legal Considerations
item.description: In this talk, we will explore the delicate balance between the benefits of open sourcing code and the need to protect your company’s valuable intellectual property.

item.title: New Members Appointed to the InnerSource Commons Foundation
item.description: April 26 2024 We are delighted to announce our new InnerSource Commons (ISC) Foundation Members: Addie Girouard, Brittany Istenes, Chan Voong, Jeff Bailey, Justin Gosses, Thomas Froment and Willem Jiang.

item.title: Transforming MLOps Culture with InnerSource Principles
item.description: In this talk, Mishari Muqbil explores how InnerSource principles like collaboration, transparency, and meritocracy can revolutionize MLOps.

item.title: Defending the Sports Metaphor - An InnerSource Primer
item.description: This talk will explore the relationship (or lack-thereof) between InnerSource and Sports to humorously show how the analogies might have utility in the world of software development.

item.title: Untangling InnerSource - Weaving Collaboration into the Fabric of Your Organisation
item.description: In this talk, we will explore the intricate dynamics of InnerSource adoption within organisations, likening its structure to a spider’s web.

item.title: Cross-Product Architecture - Lessons Learned from Applying Conway’s Law
item.description: This talk will look at the “Cross-Product Architecture” collaboration model which some consider SAP’s largest InnerSource project involving 3,000+ architects and experts across numerous organizations.

item.title: InnerSource and APIs
item.description: This talk will serve as an open discussion for the community of the InnerSource Commons on how to effectively bring together APIs as a way to produce software and have clear communication channels across teams, all with the goal of allowing high API reuse and high autonomy for all teams.

item.title: Managing InnerSource Projects
item.description: Join us on this community call to hear Yuki Hattori, from GitHub, tell us how he manages InnerSource projects that enables individuals to contribute their expertise, fosters innovation, and strengthens the overall development process within the organization.

item.title: Effective InnerSource; Strategies for Resource-Constrained Teams
item.description: Join us on this community call to hear Jeff Bailey tell us how he uses strategies for resource-constrained teams for Effective InnerSource.

item.title: InnerSource Commons End of Year Call
item.description: Join us on this community call to discuss all that has happened in 2023; celebrate all the wins and look at the learnings.

item.title: Building an InnerSource Culture of Trust on the Path to Open Source
item.description: Join us on this community call to hear Brian Proffitt, from Red Hat, discuss how to build an InnerSource culture of trust on the path to open source.

item.title: InnerSource Summit 2023
item.description: Registrations are Now Open 15th & 16th November 2023 - online Join us at the world’s leading gathering of InnerSource practitioners.

item.title: Getting Ready for State of InnerSource 2024
item.description: Join us on this community call to hear Clare Dillon, from University of Galway, discuss getting ready for State of InnerSource 2024.

item.title: Leveraging Special Interest Groups to expand your enterprise InnerSource initiative
item.description: Join us on this community call to hear Brittany Istenes, from Fannie Mae, discuss the importance of leveraging Special Interest Groups to expand your enterprise InnerSource initiative.

item.title: Starting with a Blank Slate - Building Your InnerSource Program From the Ground Up
item.description: Join us on this community call to hear Katie Schueths, from Analog Devices, discuss Starting with a Blank Slate - Building Your InnerSource Program From the Ground Up

item.title: Improving Engineering Collaboration across the Singapore Government through Innersource
item.description: Join us on this community call to hear Hunter Nield, from Govtech, discuss Improving Engineering Collaboration across the Singapore Government through Innersource

item.title: Russell Rutledge appointed as new Executive Director of InnerSource Commons
item.description: August 2023 The InnerSource Commons Foundation (ISC), the world’s foremost community for InnerSource practitioners, today announced Russell Rutledge as its Executive Director.

item.title: How InnerSource enabled the creation of watsonx.ai
item.description: Join us on this community call to hear Bill Higgins, from IBM, discuss How InnerSource enabled the creation of watsonx.

item.title: How the Process Management Standards for Open Source Compliance and Security Impact InnerSource
item.description: Join us on this community call to hear Shane Coughlan from OpenChain Project at The Linux Foundation discuss how the Process Management Standards for Open Source Compliance and Security Impact InnerSource

item.title: Cultural crosswires - how to communicate effectively and still be misunderstood
item.description: Join us on this community call to hear Mishari Muqbil from Zymple discuss Cultural Crosswires - how to communicate effectively and still be misunderstood!

item.title: New Members Appointed to the InnerSource Commons Foundation
item.description: June, 2023 We are delighted to announce the election of our new InnerSource Commons (ISC) Foundation Members: Guilherme Dellagustin, Yuki Hattori, Bill Higgins and Katie Schueths.

item.title: Beyond Operational Planning Advocating the Strategic Value of an ISPO
item.description: Join us on this community call to hear Thomas Forment from Komyu discuss Beyond Operational Planning: Advocating the Strategic Value of an InnerSource Program Office (ISPO)

item.title: InnerSource Commons Welcomes our new Board and Officers
item.description: May, 2023 The InnerSource Commons Foundation is delighted to announce the election of a new Board of Directors and Officers comprising of Isabel Drost-Fromm (Chair), Daniel Izquierdo Cortazar (President), Russ Rutledge (Vice President) Tom Sadler (Secretary), Sebastian Spier (Assistant Secretary), Matt Cobby, Georg Grütter, Yuki Hattori, and Dmitrii Sugrobov.

item.title: Understanding Conflict
item.description: Join us on this community call to hear Ciara Flanagan from ResetRP discuss how best to deal with conflict when we meet it in relation to InnerSource.

item.title: Running an OSPO the Open Source / InnerSource way
item.description: Join us on this community call to hear Thomas Steenbergen from EPAM Systems share the story of how he chose to use industry collaboration and InnerSource as the way to address open source challenges.

item.title: State of InnerSource 2023
item.description: Join us on this community call to hear Clare Dillon from InnerSource Commons share the results from this year’s survey in The State of InnerSource 2023.

item.title: Using Backstage as an InnerSource Portal
item.description: Join us on this community call to hear Miguel Capitao from Deutsche Bank discuss how he uses Backstage as an InnerSource portal.

item.title: Trouver les arguments pour l’InnerSource
item.description: Join us for our first french-speaking community call when Gilles Gravier will show us how to present the business case for InnerSource.

item.title: Implementing InnerSource Metrics
item.description: Join us on this community call to hear how Luis Cañas-Díaz from Bitergia is Implenting InnerSource Metrics.

item.title: Spelling InnerSource - a history
item.description: Join us at this community call to hear the history of the InnerSource Spelling from InnerSource Commons founder, Danese Cooper.

item.title: Building the Case for InnerSource
item.description: In this session, Gilles Gravier from Wipro will explore the value propositions for InnerSource that get buy-in from senior leadership in organizations.

item.title: Decision Making at Scale for InnerSource
item.description: InnerSource projects are powerful because they scale. They scale in impact and in quality and function.

item.title: Applying OpenChain and SBOMs for InnerSource
item.description: In this session we discuss how to apply OpenChain and SBOMs for InnerSource. we will look at applying open source industry best practices and standards.

item.title: ISC End of Year community call
item.description: For our ISC End of Year community call we will be celebrating our wins and examine our learnings.

item.title: An ISPO Working Group for the ISC
item.description: This session will discuss forming an ISC working group to document challenges that we have, and plan that solutions to those challenges are implemented as much as possible in the open.

item.title: InnerSource Summit 2022
item.description: Registrations are Now Open 16th & 17th November 2022 - online Join us at the world’s leading gathering of InnerSource practitioners.

item.title: InnerSource Commons Halloween Spook-tacular
item.description: This community call will be the second of two Halloween Spook-tacular calls discussing InnerSource Horror Stories!

item.title: InnerSource Commons Halloween Spook-tacular
item.description: This community call will be the first of two Halloween Spook-tacular calls discussing InnerSource Horror Stories!

item.title: How to Create an InnerSource Culture
item.description: This presentation will talk about culture, the importance of building the right foundation and proven tips you can leverage to create for a lasting Innersource culture.

item.title: InnerSource to Open Source
item.description: InnerSource to Open Source - taking the next step. This session will share experiences from both Matt Cobby & Mishari Muqbil on taking the path from Inner to Open Source and the benefits of taking that journey.

item.title: InnerSource Commons Gathering
item.description: Join us for the first post-COVID in-person gathering of the InnerSource Commons community!

item.title: Demystifying OSPOs
item.description: During this talk, Ana Jimenez Santamaria will share some of the insights from the last OSPO survey from the TODO Group and discuss where and how InnerSource could accelerate open source adoption within an organization’s open-source journey.

item.title: InnerSource Catchup
item.description: Join us for a Lean Coffee event designed to facilitate informal learning and sharing of insights, challenges and best practices in a safe environment, which will surface the areas of interest that we will focus on in future events.

item.title: InnerSource Catchup
item.description: Join us for a Lean Coffee event designed to facilitate informal learning and sharing of insights, challenges and best practices in a safe environment, which will surface the areas of interest that we will focus on in future events.

item.title: FINOS InnerSource Panel
item.description: In place of our usual community call, on June, 21st (5pm BST / 6pm CEST / 9:30 pm IST/ 12am PST) we are partnering with FINOS to bring you a Panel discussion on the topic of InnerSource in Financial Services.

item.title: InnerSource Culture Change
item.description: Join us for a fascinating panel discussion on InnerSource Culture Change where Paul Fijnvandraat (Microsoft), Harleen Kaur (Microsoft), Mishari Muqbil (Zymple) and Clare Dillon (InnerSource Commons) will share their experiences on this topic.

item.title: Incentivizing Culture Change
item.description: Join us for a stimulating panel discussion on Incentivizing Culture Change, where Micaela Eller (IBM), Wolfgang Gehring (Mercedes Benz) and Katie Schueths (Indeed) will share their own experiences on this topic.

item.title: Annuaire des services InnerSource
item.description: Bienvenue dans l’annuaire des services InnerSource. Nous avons compilé une liste d’entreprises qui fournissent des services InnerSource dans trois catégories : Outils, Services de conseil et Services de formation.

item.title: The Role of Middle Management
item.description: Join us for a fascinating panel discussion on the role of Middle Management featuring Matt Cobby (Deloitte), Danese Cooper (InnerSource Commons), Jamie Strusz (GitHub), and Jack Yang (Trend Micro).

item.title: InnerSource Commons Welcomes our new Board and Officers
item.description: May, 2022 The InnerSource Commons Foundation is delighted to announce the election of a new Board of Directors comprising of Danese Cooper (Chairperson), Isabel Drost-Fromm (President), Daniel Izquierdo Cortazar (Vice President), Tom Sadler (Secretary), Jacob Green, Georg Grütter, Johannes Tigges, Sebastian Spier, and Klaas-Jan Stol.

item.title: New Members Appointed to the InnerSource Commons Foundation
item.description: May, 2022 We are delighted to announce the election of new InnerSource Commons Foundation Members: Matt Cobby, Cristina Coffey, Zack Koppert, Mishari Muqbil and Igor Zubiaurre.

item.title: Creating Platforms with InnerSource
item.description: Join us on April 26th when Hong Phuc Dang (FOSSASIA) and Dr Lorraine Morgan (NUIG) will discuss their research at Zalando, Philips Healthcare and PayPal into Creating Platforms with InnerSource.

item.title: State of InnerSource
item.description: Come along to our next event where Klaas-Jan Stol (University College Cork) and Clare Dillon (InnerSource Commons) will discuss the results of the State of InnerSource 2021 Report.

item.title: Community Building in the context of InnerSource
item.description: Join us for our next event where Shilla Saebi (Comcast), Georg J.P. Link (Bitergia) and Isabel Drost-Fromm (Europace) will discuss Community Building in the context of InnerSource.

item.title: Transfer Pricing for InnerSource Projects
item.description: Come along to our next Community Call on Transfer Pricing for InnerSource Projects where we will be joined by Gijs Meijer (ING Bank), Wolf Salden (ING Bank) and Jesus Gutierrez (Grupo Santander) where they will discuss the tax implications of transferring IP when conducting InnerSource projects

item.title: InnerSource Security
item.description: Come along to our next Community Call to hear from Vishal Kulshrestha (Verizon), Elspeth Minty (Morgan Stanley) & Conley Rogers (GitLab) discussing the way they have tackled the challenge of developing securely while collaborating across the business.

item.title: InnerSource ROI & People Strategies
item.description: In this session, we will be joined by Matt Cobby from Deloitte, Daniel Izquierdo from Bitergia and Swapnil Kulkarni from Nuance who will be sharing their experiences of InnerSource ROI & Convincing Leaders

item.title: InnerSource Programs & People Strategies
item.description: Join us for our first InnerSource Community Call of 2022 where we will discuss the topic of InnerSource Programs & People Strategies.

item.title: 2021 Year End Call
item.description: Join us for our Year End InnerSource Commons Community Call to connect and celebrate a great year past and agree on priorities for 2022.

item.title: InnerSource Commons Outstanding Contributors 2021
item.description: The Internet, November 19th, 2021 2021 has been a significant year for InnerSource Commons. With over 50 active contributors across the 3 working groups, the community has significantly increased its activity and achieved some amazing results.

item.title: InnerSource Summit 2021
item.description: 17th and 18th November 2021, online Get your ticket now! Join us at the world’s largest InnerSource Conference!

item.title: Strategies for Kick-starting InnerSource
item.description: Join us for an InnerSource Commons Community Call where we will discuss Strategies to Kick-start InnerSource in enterprise organizations with Jesús Alonso Gutierrez from Grupo Santander and Shishir Saxena from Fidelity.

item.title: Clare Dillon Joins InnerSource Commons as First Executive Director
item.description: The Internet, October 19th, 2021 The InnerSource Commons Foundation (ISC), the world’s foremost community for InnerSource practitioners, today announced Clare Dillon as Executive Director.

item.title: InnerSource Patterns
item.description: Join us for an InnerSource Commons Community Call where we will discuss the topic of InnerSource Patterns with Gil Yehuda from US Bank, Fei Wan from Comcast and Sebastian Spier from Meltwater.

item.title: InnerSource Commons announces first Partners and Supporters helping to scale the efforts in creating and sharing InnerSource knowledge
item.description: The Internet, September 22, 2021 InnerSource Commons, the world’s largest community of InnerSource practitioners, today announced seven new Partners and Supporters at the launch of their new Sponsorship Program.

item.title: InnerSource in the Enterprise
item.description: Join us for an InnerSource Commons Community Call where we will discuss the topic of InnerSource in the Enterprise - Stories from National Australia Bank and Huawei with Matt Cobby and Willem Jiang.

item.title: InnerSource in Action
item.description: Join us for an InnerSource Commons Community Call where we will discuss the topic of InnerSource in Action with Georg Grütter from Bosch and Isabel Drost-Fromm from Europace.

item.title: InnerSource & Discoverability
item.description: Join us for an InnerSource Commons Community Call where we will discuss the topic of InnerSource & Discoverability with Michael Graf and Guilherme Delagustin from SAP.

item.title: InnerSource & DevOps
item.description: In this session we will be joined by Fei Wan from Comcast, Steph Egan from BBC and Tom Sadler from BBC who will be sharing their experiences of implementing DevOps with InnerSource.

item.title: InnerSource in Government
item.description: In this session we will be joined by Zack Koppert from GitHub and some of the InnerSource Community, who will be sharing their experiences of how to implement InnerSource in government organizations.

item.title: InnerSource Metrics, Value & ROI Community Call
item.description: In this session we will be joined by Joe Patrao from Bloomberg and Daniel Izquierdo from Bitergia, who will be sharing their experiences of how to measure the success of your InnerSource implementation.

item.title: InnerSource Commons Joins FINOS
item.description: InnerSource Commons to Further Collaboration Within Fintech Organizations We are delighted that to announce that InnerSource Commons is now an associate member of FINOS, the Fintech Open Source Foundation.

item.title: InnerSource Commons announces the appointment of a new Board of Directors
item.description: The InnerSource Commons Foundation is delighted to announce the election of a new Board of Directors comprising of Danese Cooper (Chairperson), Isabel Drost-Fromm (President), Georg Grutter (Vice President), Cedric Williams (Treasurer), Russell Rutledge (Secretary), Johannes Tigges (Assistant Secretary), Maximilian Capraro, Daniel Izquierdo Cortazar and Jacob Green.

item.title: APAC Virtual Summit 2020
item.description: 2nd and 3rd December 2020, online - event site! The 12th InnerSource Commons Summit was our first summit timed for our growing APAC community.

item.title: Statement of Support of the EC Adoption of InnerSource
item.description: The InnerSource Commons welcomes the European Commission’s new Open Source Software Strategy 2020-2023 highlighting how InnerSource (the creation of working cultures based on open source) is an integral part of a robust open source strategy and ecosystem.

item.title: North American Fall Virtual Summit 2020
item.description: 15th and 16th September 2020, online! The 11th InnerSource Commons Summit stayed online thanks to the success of the ISC Online Spring Summit 2020.

item.title: Spring Summit 2020
item.description: 14th to 15th April 2020, online The 10th InnerSource Commons Summit took place in your living room!

item.title: Incorporation of InnerSource Commons Foundation
item.description: Press Release: Incorporation of InnerSource Commons Foundation The InnerSource Commons Foundation (ISC) was incorporated on February 19th, 2020 and is taking steps to become a 501(c)(3) public charity.

item.title: Fall Summit 2019
item.description: MossLabs.io, St. Francis Neighborhood Center, Maryland Institute College of Art, & The Johns Hopkins University proudly welcome the InnerSource Commons community to Baltimore.

item.title: InnerSource Day @ OSCON 2019
item.description: InnerSource day at OSCON is a gathering of industry practitioners discussing real-world implementations of this community-inspired, transformational open source approach to software development within the enterprise.

item.title: Spring Summit 2019
item.description: 9th to 11th April 2019 in Galway, Ireland Follow us on Twitter and Facebook and share your experience of the Summit.

item.title: Fall Summit 2018
item.description: October 3-5, 2018 in Islandia, New York, USA Event That’s an official wrap on the InnerSource Commons Fall Summit!

item.title: Spring Summit 2018
item.description: May 16-18 Wed-Fri near Stuttgart, Germany Pictures and Videos The ISC.S6 is a wrap! Thanks to all attendees for making this summit such an engaging and interesting one!

item.title: Fall Summit 2017
item.description: September 27-29 Wed-Fri in Chicago (Naperville, IL), USA Fifty nine people representing twenty two companies and institutions were present for the InnerSource Commons Fall Summit 2017 in Naperville, IL, USA.

item.title: Spring Summit 2017
item.description: April 18-20 in Geneva, Switzerland Join us for the next InnerSource Commons Summit in Geneva, Switzerland.

item.title: Fall Summit 2016
item.description: September 28-30 in Boston, USA Join us for the next InnerSource Commons Summit in Boston, USA.

item.title: InnerSource @ OSCON US 2016
item.description: May 16-19 in Austin, Texas There are several opportunities to learn more about InnerSource at OSCON US this year.

item.title: Spring Summit 2016
item.description: April 21-22 2016 in London, England Companies today already understand that Open Source is necessary.

Date and Time of Meeting 2023-05-25, 2 p.m. - 3 p.m. CEST Call to order 14:02 CEST Adjourned 14:41 CEST Next meeting 2023-06-29: 7 PM CEST Roll call Directors and Officers Present Isabel Drost-Fromm (Chair) Daniel Izquierdo Cortazar (President) Russ Rutledge (Vice President) Silona Bonewald (Treasurer) Sebastian Spier (Assistant Secretary) Matt Cobby Georg Gruetter Yuki Hattori Dmitrii Sugrobov Directors and Officers Absent Tom Sadler (Secretary) Maximilian Capraro (Assistant Treasurer) Members Present Clare Dillon (Executive Director) Votes Taken No proposals were voted on.

Date and Time of Meeting 2023-06-29, 9am - 10am CEST Call to order 9:03 CEST Adjourned 10:00 CEST Next meeting 2023-07-27: 2pm CEST Roll call Directors and Officers Present Isabel Drost-Fromm (Chair) Daniel Izquierdo Cortazar (President) Tom Sadler (Secretary) Sebastian Spier (Assistant Secretary) Matt Cobby Yuki Hattori Georg Grütter (by proxy of Daniel Izquierdo Cortazar) Directors and Officers Absent Russ Rutledge (Vice President) Silona Bonewald (Treasurer) Maximilian Capraro (Assistant Treasurer) Dmitrii Sugrobov Members Present Clare Dillon (Executive Director) Votes Taken Vote on having Russell Rutledge as new Executive Director of the InnerSource Commons Foundation starting on the 1st of July 2023.

item.title: Code de Conduite InnerSource Commons
item.description: Notre engagement En tant que membres, contributeurs et dirigeants, nous nous engageons à faire de la participation à notre communauté une expérience sans harcèlement pour tous, quel que soit l’âge ou le sexe.

item.title: Membres
item.description: La communauté InnerSource Commons (ISC) est ouverte à tous. Certains participants à la communauté se surpassent et peuvent être invités à devenir membre de l’ISC.

item.title: Microsoft DevOps Dojo InnerSource Case Study
item.description: Summary When done right, InnerSource is one of the most effective ways to release trapped value in the enterprise.

item.title: Nos Sponsors
item.description: Nos Partenaires Analog Devices Bitergia GitHub IBM Microsoft Nos Supporters Adeo Bosch Comcast Fannie Mae indeed lenstra Mercedes Benz Red Hat SAP Devenir un Sponsor

item.title: Nous contacter
item.description: Le moyen le plus rapide et le plus efficace de nous joindre est de rejoindre Slack et de poser votre question dans le canal #general.

item.title: Past Summits
item.description: InnerSource Summit 2023 Registrations are Now Open 15th & 16th November 2023 - online Join us at the world’s leading gathering of InnerSource practitioners.

item.title: Privacy Policy
item.description: InnerSource Commons is an independent non-for-profit organisation that creates and shares knowledge about InnerSource for its members.
